data.name: ActiveCarousel
data.value: A premier alternative to traditional gyms.

data.name: AdMessage
data.value:
Welcome to HopePH.
Things that you could do here: 1. You could post your feelings ANONYMOUSLY. Our HopePH heroes would give friendly advise or show support. Friendly advise is NOT a replacement for seeing a licensed psychotherapist for counseling.
2. You could browse mental health care facilities and crisis hotlines directory.
3. You could read contents and learn about depression.
To start, click on the hamburger menu at the top left corner to browse our menu.

data.name: AdMessageRequiresAttention
data.value: This message requires action. Apology for the inconvenience.

data.name: CrisisHotlineReminder
data.value: Friendly Reminder in using the hotlines! FYI. This is an initial directory of crisis hotlines in the Philippines. Please do not do prank calls. Calls are recorded and audited.

data.name: DeletingPostNotSuccessful
data.value: Deleting your post wasnt successful. Please try again!

data.name: DepressionBlurb
data.value: Depression can happen to anyone and does happen to one in four of us over our lifetimes. Different factors that make it more likely to happen, include biological make-up, upbringing, or reaction to life events. What keeps it going though, is how we deal with those things. The way we think and what we do affects the way we feel. Depression is often accompanied by other feelings such as guilt, shame anger and anxiety.

data.name: PostingReminder
data.value: Friendly reminder when writing your feelings/emotions and replying. 1. Do not judge somebody's post or comments. Always think of '"no bad intentions". 2. Empower and support everyone in the community. 3. Avoid labeling. Do not call someone "sick", "maarte", "poor", "lazy", etc because it is only yourself who defines that. We are all equally imperfect. 4. Promotes friendly, sisterly, and brotherly advices. This is NOT a replacement of seeing a professional psychologist and psychiatrist.

data.name: PullDownInstruction
data.value: When needed, you could pull down to refresh posts from the server :)

data.name: WelcomeInstructions1
data.value: You could post your feelings anonymously. When you post only your alias is shown.

data.name: WelcomeInstructions2
data.value: If you wish to see a local psychologist or psychiatrist, you could browse the mental care facilities section. You could sort them by location and, you could also call their tel nos straight away.

data.name: WelcomeInstructions3
data.value: If you are in crisis or your family or friends, you can browse to the directory of crisis providers section. You could easily tap and call their tel nos.

data.name: WelcomeInstructions4
data.value: Signing up with facebook or signing up with aliasname only are provided. Your privacy and data security is our top priority.
